'''NOTE:''' 

This is the Xenial Xerus '''Beta 1''' Release.

Xubuntu '''''milestone Releases''''' are '''NOT''' recommended for:
* Regular users who are not aware of pre-release issues
* Anyone who needs a stable system
* Anyone uncomfortable running a possibly frequently broken system
* Anyone in a production environment with data or workflows that need to be reliable

Xubuntu ''milestone'' Releases are recommended for:
* Regular users who want to help us test by finding, reporting, and/or fixing bugs

(Bug:1547302) "Check disc for defects" boot option displays no text some flavors

(Bug:966480) The prompt asking for media removal is not shown at the end of the installation -VirtualBox
